{"id":1498075622,"question_id":3702,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"10 months, 1 week","timestamp":1736048604,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"43 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1498075622/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Subarray With Equal Products","memory":"28 MB","code":"// #include <boost/math/common_factor.hpp>\n\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    int maxLength(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int ans = 0;    \n\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n        for (int l=0; l<N; l++) {\n            for (int r=l; r<N; r++) {\n                long long prod = nums[l];\n                long long gcd_ = nums[l];\n                long long lcm_ = nums[l];\n                for (int i=l+1; i<=r; i++) {\n                    if (prod >= 1e16)\n                        break;\n                    prod *= nums[i];\n                    gcd_ = gcd(gcd_, nums[i]);\n                    lcm_ = lcm(lcm_, nums[i]);\n                }\n                if (prod == gcd_ * lcm_)\n                    ans = max(ans, r-l+1);\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-subarray-with-equal-products","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1019}
